__TOC__


The kernel team often needs to investigate various kernel configuration options or perhaps kernel sub-systems to ensure that we have a correctly configured kernel.  This page links to various project investigations and results.

Ubuntu Quantal
* <nowiki>[[http://kernel.ubuntu.com/~cking/slub-slab|SLUB vs SLAB]]</nowiki> - Analysis of SLUB vs SLAB kernel memory allocators
* <nowiki>[[IPv6|IPv6]]</nowiki> - How well does Ubuntu work with IPv6
* <nowiki>[[http://kernel.ubuntu.com/~cking/iosched|CFQ vs Deadline]]</nowiki> - Choice of I/O scheduler for Quantal
* <nowiki>[[http://kernel.ubuntu.com/~cking/low-latency-kernel/results.txt|Low Latency Kernel Results]]</nowiki> - Low Latency benchmarking
